text: "Hour of the Wolf" is a song performed by Azerbaijani singer Elnur Hüseynov, which was written by Sandra Bjurman, Nicolas Rebscher, Nicklas Lif and Lina Hansson. The song was chosen by public broadcaster İTV to represent Azerbaijan in the Eurovision Song Contest 2015. It was premièred on 15 March 2015. Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Eurovision songs of 2015 Category:Eurovision songs of Azerbaijan
title: Hour of the Wolf (song)
